(2, 1).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(2, 1).description:
This cavern chamber is dimly lit with a strange pink glow. Scattered on the walls are torches with illuminated 
        crystals instead of flames. Strange, ethereal sounds echo off of the rock surfaces with no decipherable pattern. 
        The air is cold and slightly humid. The stone walls are damp to the touch.

props.name: Spiritual Umbral Battleaxe
props.description: A crescent blade affixed to a reinforced wooden haft. It is light and easy to swing.
props.announce: There's a Spiritual Umbral Battleaxe here.

(8, 1).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(8, 1).description:
This cavern chamber is dimly lit with a strange pink glow. Scattered on the walls are torches with illuminated 
        crystals instead of flames. Strange, ethereal sounds echo off of the rock surfaces with no decipherable pattern. 
        The air is cold and slightly humid. The stone walls are damp to the touch.

props.name: Gold
props.description: A small pouch containing 1 gold pieces.
props.announce: There's a small pouch of gold on the ground.

props.name: Draught
props.description:
A green fluid giving off a warm, pleasant glow.
Invigorating for any tired adventurer.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle of glowing green fluid on the ground. Its label reads, simply, 'Draught.'

(2, 2).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(2, 2).description:
The cave narrows a bit here and the ceiling hangs low. A steady breeze sings through crystalline fingers that thrust out at scattered points 
        along the walls and floor. Ethereal noises echo hauntingly from distant chambers. The tight space makes for an uncomfortable passage, but 
        nonetheless yields further exploration for those willing to squeeze through.

(5, 2).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom

(3, 3).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(3, 3).description:
This cavern chamber is dimly lit with a strange pink glow. Scattered on the walls are torches with illuminated 
        crystals instead of flames. Strange, ethereal sounds echo off of the rock surfaces with no decipherable pattern. 
        The air is cold and slightly humid. The stone walls are damp to the touch.

props.name: Antidote
props.description:
A murky green fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it restores a small amount of health and 
neutralizes harmful toxins in the bloodstream.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle on the ground with a murky green fluid inside and a label reading, 'Antidote.'

(7, 3).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(7, 3).description:
This cavern chamber is dimly lit with a strange pink glow. Scattered on the walls are torches with illuminated 
        crystals instead of flames. Strange, ethereal sounds echo off of the rock surfaces with no decipherable pattern. 
        The air is cold and slightly humid. The stone walls are damp to the touch.

props.name: Restorative
props.description:
A strange pink fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it seems to cause your wounds to immediately mend themselves.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass vial on the ground with an odd pink fluid inside and a label reading, 'Restorative.'

props.name: Draught
props.description:
A green fluid giving off a warm, pleasant glow.
Invigorating for any tired adventurer.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle of glowing green fluid on the ground. Its label reads, simply, 'Draught.'

props.name: Gold
props.description: A small pouch containing 23 gold pieces.
props.announce: There's a small pouch of gold on the ground.

props.name: Leather Cap
props.description: A simple leather cap offering modest protection without much weight.

props.name: Silver Ring
props.description:
A shiny silver ring. 
A small bauble favored by people of typically lower class.

props.name: Antidote
props.description:
A murky green fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it restores a small amount of health and 
neutralizes harmful toxins in the bloodstream.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle on the ground with a murky green fluid inside and a label reading, 'Antidote.'

props.name: Leather Gloves
props.description: Treated leather gloves that protect the hands without overly restricting movement.

props.name: Remains
props.description: The remains of an unfortunate merchant, trapped in the caverns long ago.
props.idle_message: There are some remains here, lying pitifully against the cavern wall.
props.announce: There are some remains here, lying pitifully against the cavern wall.

(1, 4).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(1, 4).description:
The floor slopes downward slightly, disappearing under a barely-discernible pool of water. The pool is ankle deep, broken only where a 
        few stone spires have dared to pierce upward from the floor into the damp air of the chamber like the groping fingers of a desperate victim. 
        Indeed, footfalls are best placed carefully here, or some of the more hidden fingers may find painful purchase.

(4, 4).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(4, 4).description:
This cavern chamber is dimly lit with a strange pink glow. Scattered on the walls are torches with illuminated 
        crystals instead of flames. Strange, ethereal sounds echo off of the rock surfaces with no decipherable pattern. 
        The air is cold and slightly humid. The stone walls are damp to the touch.

(1, 5).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(1, 5).description:
The area brightens significantly thanks to a skylight cut into the ceiling. The opening, as brutal in shape as the painful brightness 
        spilling through it, is much too small for most creatures, but nonetheless is a welcome change from the darkness. 
        Thick tapestries of green moss cling to the walls, grateful too for the life-giving illumination. The juxtaposition of the light against 
        the darkness of the rest of the cavern carries with it the dangers of a false sense of security in this inhospitable tomb.

props.name: Gold
props.description: A small pouch containing 1 gold pieces.
props.announce: There's a small pouch of gold on the ground.

props.name: Antidote
props.description:
A murky green fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it restores a small amount of health and 
neutralizes harmful toxins in the bloodstream.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle on the ground with a murky green fluid inside and a label reading, 'Antidote.'

(4, 5).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(4, 5).description:
The cave narrows a bit here and the ceiling hangs low. A steady breeze sings through crystalline fingers that thrust out at scattered points 
        along the walls and floor. Ethereal noises echo hauntingly from distant chambers. The tight space makes for an uncomfortable passage, but 
        nonetheless yields further exploration for those willing to squeeze through.

(6, 5).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(6, 5).description:
The ceiling rises quickly here as the cave opens up into a large chamber. The far wall is lost in a haze of darkness only slightly abated by 
        the soft neon glow of scattered crystal formations. There is an oppressive silence, as if the world is holding it's breath in trepidation. 
        Any traveler, too, might become wary when faced with such silence and unspeakable distances. An odd sense of vulnerability permeates the dank 
        stillness of the place.

(7, 5).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom

(5, 9).title: VerdetteCavernsSpring
(5, 9).description:
The unmistakable sound of water trickling over rock can be heard echoing throughout this small chamber. The air is filled
        with a fresh, life-giving smell that immediately improves Jean's mood. This would be an excellent place to stop for a short
        rest before continuing on.

props.name: HealingSpring
props.description: A burbling spring with fresh smelling water. It is clean and very inviting.
props.idle_message: There is a small spring bubbling here.
props.announce: There is a small spring bubbling here.
